title: Towards a Capability Assessment Model for the Comprehension and Adoption of AI in Organisations. (arXiv:2305.15922v1 [cs.CY])
abstract: The comprehension and adoption of Artificial Intelligence (AI) are beset with practical and ethical problems. This article presents a 5-level AI Capability Assessment Model (AI-CAM) and a related AI Capabilities Matrix (AI-CM) to assist practitioners in AI comprehension and adoption. These practical tools were developed with business executives, technologists, and other organisational stakeholders in mind. They are founded on a comprehensive conception of AI compared to those in other AI adoption models and are also open-source artefacts. Thus, the AI-CAM and AI-CM present an accessible resource to help inform organisational decision-makers on the capability requirements for (1) AI-based data analytics use cases based on machine learning technologies; (2) Knowledge representation to engineer and represent data, information and knowledge using semantic technologies; and (3) AI-based solutions that seek to emulate human reasoning and decision-making. translated_title: 面向组织中对人工智能理解和采用的能力评估模型
translated_abstract: 人工智能（AI）的理解和采用面临实际和伦理问题。本文介绍了一个五级AI能力评估模型（AI-CAM）和相关的AI能力矩阵（AI-CM），以帮助从业人员理解和采用AI。这些实用工具是为商业高管、技术人员和其他组织利益相关者设计的。它们基于对AI的全面概念，相对于其他AI采用模型，也是开放源代码。因此，AI-CAM和AI-CM提供了一个可以获取的资源，以帮助组织的决策者了解基于机器学习技术的基于AI的数据分析用例、使用语义技术来工程化和代表数据、信息和知识的知识表示以及旨在模仿人类推理和决策的AI解决方案的核心能力要求。
tldr: 本文介绍了一个五级AI能力评估模型（AI-CAM）和相关的AI能力矩阵（AI-CM），用于帮助组织的决策者了解基于机器学习技术的AI数据分析用例、使用语义技术的知识工程和代表数据的知识表示以及旨在模仿人类推理和决策的AI解决方案的核心能力要求。
